Transcription for 1003731

Weominous
.
Abby Harvey
Dubbed by
cowardice
and
When the star-eyed, my willing heart,
All made their love to thee.
I pledge my faith, my life to you,
The range that our great deal is bound,
And all our pride is to thee.
Good well, O fair, our dear and close,
With hope the heart can reach the ground,
And life on earth we hope.
The whole of nation's life above,
And in the rising sun on yore,
Thou shalt be our guide.
I pledge my life, my life to thee,
The whole of nation's life above,
And life on earth we hope.
God, where art thou, and where art thou and I,
T'was well and well above the sky,
Above the clear blue sky.
Amen.
